tool_description: Calculates comprehensive fulfillment performance metrics including order processing times, delivery success rates, and operational efficiency indicators.

aggregation_period.description: Time period for metric aggregation: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly

error_messages: Invalid metric categories: Use combinations of [speed, accuracy, cost, customer_satisfaction, inventory_impact]
Invalid aggregation period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly]
Insufficient data: Not enough data points for reliable metric calculation
usage: Select metric_categories from available options, choose aggregation_period, and optionally enable trend analysis for comprehensive performance insights.

trend_direction.description: Overall performance trend: improving, declining, stable
